item.title: This Is Just An Extra Step He Has To Do!
item.description: A worker takes on one more task to ensure the project is done right, showing attention to detail and dedication on the job.

media:content.media:title: This Is Just An Extra Step He Has To Do!
media:content.media:description: A worker takes on one more task to ensure the project is done right, showing attention to detail and dedication on the job.

item.title: Let’s See What He’ll Pay for This Bel Air!
item.description: A classic Bel Air hits the spotlight as negotiations begin — will the offer match this vintage beauty’s true value?

item.title: This Jade Might Be The One!
item.description: A miner discovers a promising piece of jade, highlighting the excitement and careful evaluation in the search for high-quality gems.

item.title: One Mistake Can Ruin This Truck!
item.description: A delicate operation shows how careful handling is crucial to protect a valuable truck during jade transport.

item.title: They Found Papers Of A Pilot From The WWI!
item.description: Historic documents from a World War I pilot resurface, offering a rare glimpse into aviation’s earliest days and the lives of those who first took to the skies.

item.title: Will He Convince Him To Sell This Car!
item.description: A rare classic sparks tough negotiations as one buyer tries to seal the deal — will passion or price win this round?

item.title: She Won't Give His Son The Full Price?!
item.description: This is a critical warning for car owners. We’ll show you how a small coolant leak quickly led to a catastrophic engine failure and the difficult steps needed to fix the damage.

item.title: Unexpected Encounter! They Were Nervous To Meet Them!
item.description: A nerve-wracking meeting unfolds as riders come face-to-face with the Hells Angels, highlighting respect and caution on the road.

item.title: They Have To Take The Helicopter!
item.description: When a unique situation arises, the team relies on a helicopter to complete their task safely and efficiently.

item.title: The Truck Has Issues, It Can't Stop!
item.description: A truck experiences mechanical issues, creating a challenging situation for the team as they work to regain control safely.

item.title: It's Very Tricky To Cross This River!
item.description: A team faces a tough challenge as they navigate a fast-moving river to continue their jade mining work safely and efficiently.

item.title: This Design Is So Unique!
item.description: Explore the craftsmanship behind a rare vintage vehicle with an eye-catching design that showcases creativity and mechanical skill.

item.title: This Is A Vintage Electrotherapy Device, Multostat!
item.description: A look at the Multostat, a vintage electrotherapy device that showcases early 20th-century technology and design.

item.title: Jeremy Jones' Snowboarding Adventures: Higher!
item.description: Join pro snowboarder Jeremy Jones as he pushes limits on breathtaking mountain slopes, capturing the thrill and beauty of high-altitude snowboarding adventures.

item.title: He Captured Proof Of A U-Boat Sinking In WWII!
item.description: Historical footage reveals a World War II moment showing the sinking of a German U-Boat at sea.

item.title: This Intense Road Is A Big Test For A 19-Year-Old!
item.description: A young worker faces challenging terrain while traveling to a jade mining site for business.

item.title: His Health Is More Important Than Flying!
item.description: A pilot prioritizes his well-being, showing that health and safety always come first in aviation.

item.title: Coin-Op Rides Were Super Popular!
item.description: A nostalgic look back at vintage coin-operated rides that once delighted kids everywhere.

item.title: He Found A Skyline That Fits His Client's Budget!
item.description: A car expert tracks down a Nissan Skyline that perfectly matches his client’s budget and style.

item.title: Ted Is Proud Of This Truck!
item.description: Ted shows off his well-kept truck, sharing what makes it special and why he takes such pride in it.
